option.particletweaks.component.title: Particle Tweaks Options
tooltip.particletweaks.trailer_cave_dust: Cave Dust particles will spawn, similarly to the Caves & Cliffs, Wild Update, and Trails & Tales trailers.
tooltip.particletweaks.trailer_torches: Torches will emit particles similar to the Caves & Cliffs trailer.
tooltip.particletweaks.trailer_campfires: Campfires will emit particles similar to the Trails & Tales trailer.
tooltip.particletweaks.trailer_bubbles:
Bubbles will stay longer and won't spawn in places they instantly pop.
With Trailer Water Movement Particles enabled, Bubbles will spawn.
tooltip.particletweaks.trailer_water_mov: Water particles will follow entities as they move through water, similarly to the Caves & Cliffs, Wild Update, and Trails & Tales trailers.
tooltip.particletweaks.trailer_ambient_w: Ambient water particles will look and act similarly to the Wild Update trailer.
tooltip.particletweaks.trailer_splashes: Splash and ripple particles can be spawned, similar to the Caves & Cliffs trailer.
tooltip.particletweaks.trailer_flowing_f: Particles will spawn in flowing fluids, similarly to the Wild Update and Trails & Tales trailers.
tooltip.particletweaks.trailer_cascades: Water can create cascades, similarly to the Caves & Cliffs, Wild Update, and Trails & Tales trailers.
tooltip.particletweaks.trailer_poof:
Poof particles will act and look similarly to the Trails & Tales and Tricky Trials trailers.
Poof particles are created upon a mob dying, or spawning via spawner.
tooltip.particletweaks.trailer_spell: Potion particles will act similarly to the Tricky Trials trailer.
